raw_comment:
What I notice is that the WNBA and the NBA are the most popular and have the larger percentages.
 
What I wonder is why are those the most popular and not the other ones.

This impacts the community because it shows how blacks don't have that opportunity to be a coach.

Basically, it is showing the percentage difference between all these black coaches. A catchy headline for this is "When will these sport coaches have equalality.
ace_sentences: I notice that the WNBA is popular.
I notice that the NBA is popular.
The WNBA has a large percentage.
The NBA has a large percentage.
I wonder why the WNBA is the most popular.
I wonder why the NBA is the most popular.
I wonder why other sports are not the most popular.
This shows that black people do not have an opportunity to be a coach.
This shows a percentage difference between black coaches.
The headline is: When will these sport coaches have equality?
